flagsdescription.title: 471.omnetpp Flags
flagsdescription.header: These are flags that appear in the benchmark sources, categorized as to whether they are portability candidates, mandatory, or forbidden.
flagsdescription.flag: -I., -Iomnet_include, -Ilibs/envir This flag is set for all builds in Spec/object.pm.

SPEC_CPU_NO_NESTED_CLASS_ACCESS can be used for compilers that do not allow access to the private members of a nested class.
This macro can be used by compilers that need "std::" to access functions in <tt>cmath</tt>.
This macro indicates that the build is for 64-bit Windows system.
